EmailTemplate.subject: Restaurant Labor Shortage Survival Strategies
EmailTemplate.textOnly: July 15, 2021 Restaurant Labor Shortage Survival Strategies The labor shortage is a complex issue that not only affects customers, who may now be experiencing longer wait times for service, but a restaurant’s staff is likely feeling overworked as they’re doing their best to keep up with the hectic pace. Share these resources from NCR with your customers to help them survive the labor shortage. Attract and Retain Great Employees - How restaurants are recruiting talent in 2021 <[[https://email.ncr.com/NjA1LUJRWS03NDAAAAF-GyU8uzYo093V_USS6_-iavxHKz_Snv4bnRCUtDPdc6DOUy-tOFnmC4Zr6zzkKZYbRkgBkzY=]]> - Set your restaurant apart to attract great employees <[[https://email.ncr.com/NjA1LUJRWS03NDAAAAF-GyU8u3uQGJh4Gt8cOoN1CHA1OjimM3lFaN12xVg9xw8N4hXRbLrM3IyPRYWjjCXAraTZDXc=]]> - Restaurant labor shortages how technology can help <[[https://email.ncr.com/NjA1LUJRWS03NDAAAAF-GyU8u7JTrhmreJi-JF-8oT13s67KatE7PqvAfmgmDt3bSbTrnwsUui8895OfY1pCBnFct_4=]]> - Hire and retain restaurant staff with advertising <[[https://email.ncr.com/NjA1LUJRWS03NDAAAAF-GyU8u0mImpTjxzswaMMt9k3SYKZ4IlFbYMPoEvy74tF0OOHtnFeBxNjf1_P92W4WrKENpAs=]]> - How many hats should you ask your staff to wear? <[[https://email.ncr.com/NjA1LUJRWS03NDAAAAF-GyU8u_mWgzNeKvrregwcorvyCUB1bBe3tFaeT-ZRqlJrxeRMpkVJsppDU2v-qwsZbSaBPnY=]]> Aloha POS Training - Aloha POS training <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/alohapos-training]]> helps with getting new employees trained quickly, so they can begin serving guests sooner Contactless Order & Pay - Check out this customer story <[[https://www.ncr.com/green-room/blu-jam-cafe]]> that profiles how NCR helped Blu Jam Café adopt QR code-based order and pay Rise of Ghost Kitchens Ghost kitchens prepare food for delivery or take-out orders, and they don’t offer dine-in service. Many restaurant operators have already figured out that a ghost kitchen can supplement revenue for their business.
